title: Federal Café
address: Two locations: Plaza de las Comendadoras 9, Plaza del Conde de Barajas 3
knownFor: Popular brunch spot with hipster Stockholm vibes
description: Spacious, bright café with beautiful decor inspired by Stockholm's Södermalm. Serves delicious brunch in cozy atmosphere with natural light. Open daily 9am-midnight (Fri-Sun until 8pm). Specialty coffee and extensive brunch menu.
